definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Brickbats and tiles, Say the bells of St. Giles 's.
sentences.chinese: 提到瓦片和砖头，就数大钟圣吉尔斯。

sentences.english: An illustration composed of small,colored stones or tiles set into cement.
sentences.chinese: 用五颜六色的小石子或瓦片在水泥板上镶嵌成的图案。

sentences.english: We use tiles to cover roofs and sometimes floors and walls.
sentences.chinese: 我们用瓦片盖房顶，有时也用瓷砖铺地面和墙面。

sentences.english: The top of the wall is usually undulated and relieved of its heaviness by tile - tracery .
sentences.chinese: 墙顶一般是波浪状，有了瓦片显得轻巧了许多。

sentences.english: It was so itchy that he had to use broken pottery to scratch himself.
sentences.chinese: 这些毒疮让他身上很痒，他必须拿瓦片刮自己。

sentences.english: During the gale roof tiles came hurtling down.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶的瓦片被大风刮了下来。

sentences.english: Destroy the tiles and clear the grid to achieve your maximum score.
sentences.chinese: 破坏瓦片和弄清楚格子完成你的最大成绩。

sentences.english: Said invention uses the electroplating method to prepare the thin copper-clad invar sheet material.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是利用电镀法制备薄覆铜因瓦片材。

sentences.english: Finally, you can install the new tile and baseboard.
sentences.chinese: 最后，你可以设置新的瓦片和脚板。

sentences.english: Margret's. Brickbats and tiles, Say the bells of St.
sentences.chinese: 提到瓦片和砖头，就数大钟圣吉尔斯。

sentences.english: An exploding gas main shattered the tiles in the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸的煤气主要管线把院子里的瓦片都震碎了。
